messages.content: Text created/updated with CEFR level B1

Text saved: Springsteen is different from many other artists who sell a lot of albums. He is in his late 60s, but he still makes new music that is very popular. He plays in big stadiums and is still one of the best musicians. This does not surprise me at all. He tells the most important stories about people's lives in his music. For example, when you listen to his album *Born in the USA*, you will see that those stories are still important today.

metadata.feedback_text: The final sentence is 23 words long, which is too long for the B1 standard. The sentence 'For example, when you listen to his album *Born in the USA*, you will see that those stories are still important today' must be broken into shorter, simpler sentences. Sentences must not exceed approximately 15 words.
